columns.name: name
columns.description: The auto-generated name for the assessment run.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The ARN of the assessment run.

columns.name: assessment_template_arn
columns.description: The ARN of the assessment template that is associated with the assessment run.

columns.name: state
columns.description: The state of the assessment run.

columns.name: completed_at
columns.description: The assessment run completion time that corresponds to the rules packages evaluation completion time or failure.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: The time when StartAssessmentRun was called.

columns.name: data_collected
columns.description: Boolean value (true or false) that specifies whether the process of collecting data from the agents is completed.

columns.name: duration_in_seconds
columns.description: The duration of the assessment run.

columns.name: started_at
columns.description: The time when StartAssessmentRun was called.

columns.name: state_changed_at
columns.description: The last time when the assessment run's state changed.

columns.name: finding_counts
columns.description: Provides a total count of generated findings per severity.

columns.name: notifications
columns.description: A list of notifications for the event subscriptions.

columns.name: rules_package_arns
columns.description: The rules packages selected for the assessment run.

columns.name: state_changes
columns.description: A list of the assessment run state changes.

columns.name: user_attributes_for_findings
columns.description: The user-defined attributes that are assigned to every generated finding.
